creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text:
If an admin changes a users password the following error is emitted:

User Profile

The parameter 'user' is missing. Please go back to the users overview page
and click on a user link.

The password is changed successfully. Tracked it down to the exit usecase not
having a parameter set to it. The exit use case is to return to the user who
just had their password changed, which fails when the user isn't provided.

creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 19020
Provides needed parameter to exit usecase

Thanks for the patch, I applied it.

BTW, please be careful not to use tabs in patches!
creator: andreas@apache.org
